name: Which Witch
description:
The players must attempt to complete tasks relating to making a potion. They must try and complete all available tasks within a time limit while trying to identify a saboteur. At the end of the round the players will have to vote on who they believe the traitor is. The game is centered around strategy, chaos, and deduction. 

James Nelson - Composer/Audio, Game Design, UI Artist

Lily Rowe - Game Design, UI Artist, Programmer

Dylan Saurbrey - Lead Programmer

Connor Boyd - Character/Texture /SFX Artist, Animator

Blake Hogben - Building/Prop Artist, Animator 

Demetria Verhoeff - Environment/Texture Artist, Animator
